ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <3> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<4> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <5> Vivitar 67mm UV Glass Filter + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <8> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> LCD Screen Protectors + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens with 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack + Filter + Accessory Kit
